show.title: The Regenerative Agroforestry Podcast
show.summary:
A space where we investigate the possibilities of agroforestry, share experiences and analyse different strategies, tools and techniques. We bring you quality, in-depth content, so that we can build together regenerative agroforestry systems.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

title: #3 Introducing agroforestry to a 1000ha grain farm with Benedikt Bösel
subtitle: #3 Introducing agroforestry to a 1000ha grain farm with Benedikt Bösel
summary:
Benedikt Bösel shares with us his journey from investment banking to regenerative farming. We explore why he is testing out agroforestry on his large scale grain farm. We also discussed how grains benefit from trees, how to lead a 20 people team towards regenerative techniques and the process of diversifying his farm.
